meanings.definition: Strong black coffee made by forcing steam through ground coffee beans.
meanings.sent1: I ordered an espresso at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys sipping on a hot espresso in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The espresso machine decided to take a steamy vacation.
meanings.sent4: His words hit me like a shot of espresso, waking me up instantly.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed espresso filled the room.

meanings.sent2: He always starts his day with a shot of espresso.
meanings.sent3: The espresso cup danced on the table, entertaining the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a cup of espresso in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the espresso lingered on his taste buds.
